SEARCH

Class ReplenishmentRequest

java.lang.Object
ReplenishmentRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ReplenishmentRequest extends Object implements Serializable
Tracks details about the requested medicine, quantity, requesting pharmacist, and request status. Implements Serializable for persistent storage.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ReplenishmentRequest

      public ReplenishmentRequest(String pharmacistId, String medicineName, int requestAmount)
      Constructs a new ReplenishmentRequest with the specified details. The request date is automatically set to the current time and status is set to PENDING.
      Parameters:
      pharmacistId - The ID of the pharmacist making the request
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to be replenished
      requestAmount - The quantity of medicine requested

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      protected static ArrayList<ReplenishmentRequest> deserialize()
      Deserializes replenishment requests from a file.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ReplenishmentRequest objects, or null if deserialization fails

    • serialize

      protected static boolean serialize(ArrayList<ReplenishmentRequest> allReplenishmentRequests)
      Serializes replenishment requests to a file.
      Parameters:
      allReplenishmentRequests - List of requests to serialize
      Returns:
      true if serialization is successful, false otherwise

    • getStatus

      public ReplenishmentRequest.ReplenishmentRequestStatus getStatus()
      Gets the current status of the replenishment request.
      Returns:
      The current status of the request

    • getMedicineName

      public String getMedicineName()
      Gets the name of the medicine requested.
      Returns:
      The medicine name

    • getRequestAmount

      public int getRequestAmount()
      Gets the quantity of medicine requested.
      Returns:
      The requested amount

    • getPharmacistId

      public String getPharmacistId()
      Gets the ID of the pharmacist who made the request.
      Returns:
      The pharmacist's ID

    • getRequestDate

      public LocalDateTime getRequestDate()
      Gets the date and time when the request was made.
      Returns:
      The request date and time

    • createReplenishmentRequest

      public static ReplenishmentRequest createReplenishmentRequest(String pharmacistId, String medication, int quantity)
      Creates a new replenishment request with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      pharmacistId - The ID of the requesting pharmacist
      medication - The name of the medication to replenish
      quantity - The amount of medication requested
      Returns:
      A new ReplenishmentRequest instance

    • approveRequest

      public void approveRequest()
      Approves the replenishment request by changing its status to APPROVED.

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints all details of the replenishment request to the console
